name: 7 Cups Of Tea - Purple
description:
A style I am working on for 7 Cups Of Tea. This is not endorsed or affiliated in any way with 7 Cups Of Tea or its partners.

Current skin status is as follows.

Full Support:

*1-1 Chat Interface
*Group Chat Interface
*General Requests Interface
*Forum Interface
*User Profiles
*Training & Certification
*Calendar
*My Impact

Partial Support:

*CK Editor (forum editor for posts)

The rest of the site may be a hit or miss until I confirm things are (to the best of my knowledge) complete! But I am trying to roll out updates as fast as I can so hopefully I will get to mapping out the ENTIRE 7COT site! :)

If you enjoy the style and wish to support my drive for expanding my skills and recreational hobby you may feel free to donate using the button below (strictly optional!). :)
additional_info:
v1.6.0 | 17/08/15 - Long Overdue Update!!

-Fixed all buttons to be consistent across the site.
-Fully styled the Notes page.
-Fully styled all the label elements.
-Finally found and styled all the tooltip elements!
-Fully styled all the loading/progress elements.
-Fixed the referral text colour in general chats.
-Changed the colour for the Listener and Member rank level icon and text to match the theme as some colours would fade into the background. This helps to take away the "unique" effect of ranks and allows for an equal setting.

v1.5.1 | 14/07/15 - New Messages overview and notifications hotfix!

-Fixed a "bug" that would make the New Messages overview seem to have a rather large border under each message displayed.
-Fixed a "vanilla bug" that would make posts you've been tagged in which made use of any of the headline tags appear too big in the notifications dropdown menu.

v1.5.0 | 14/07/15 - Training, Calendar and My Impact pages done!

-Fixed the alert info boxes to work correctly in group chats.
-Styled the buttons in group chats so that they match the theme now.
-Changed the ranks background to be more uniform with the style and added a shadow to it for a 3D effect.
-Added a stripped background to the ranks level progress bar.
-Fixed an issue where the action buttons in 1-1 chats would be hidden in the chatbox background due to a previous update.
-Added the "3D" background effect to the alert tabs on the Announcements/Alerts page.
-Fully styled the Browse Listeners page.
-Fully styled the Training and Certification pages.
-Fully styled the Calendar page.
-Fully styled the My Impact page.
-Fixed an issue where the header menu items would have the incorrect style on the current active page.

v1.4.0 | 10/07/15 - Bug fixes & Dashboard ready!

-Fixed the weird huge border around user images in the forums.
-Fixed a bug that made all image borders rounded due to another element.
-Added support for the header menu items. That concludes all menu items!
-Fixed a bug that would hide text in the notifications bar if you were tagged in a post.
-Added a fix for user profiles where the rank in certain colours could be hidden or not contrast with the background. Ranks now have their own background to counter this.
-Finally found and changed the little info circles to match the style!
-Added support for the popover boxes.
-Fixed a bug which would hide the status indicators from showing their colours in user profiles and 1-1 chats.
-Changed horizontal ruler elements to dotted and their colour to match the style.
-Completed styling the entire dashboard view.
-Completed styling the entire 'My Progress Path' section.

v1.3.0 | 09/07/15 - User profiles ready!

-Completed support for all user profile elements!
-Added a fix for profiles and other sections to have their own unique background (so it isn't all lost in the black void as it was).
-Changed the Headline and Breadcrumb elements text colour to work with the new background colour.
-Added support for the 'categories' element on profile pages.
-Fixed the issue caused by update 1.2.0 which removed the default status colours (Online/Away/Offline).
-Changed the online switch element to display a uniform text colour.
-Changed the shadow overlay for many input elements.
-Fixed links showing up black when held down but not clicked on.
-Fixed all paragraph tags to use the default style text colour.
-Fixed the login page box to match the style.

v1.2.0 | 08/07/15 - Another major update!
- Replaced the 7COT indicator image with a replica using ONLY CSS!
- Fixed said indicator to now also show your own message indicator!
- Switched around button colours to better match the background colours.
- Added a notice at the bottom of the page near the copyright informing you of the style version.
- Started working on the CK Editor! So far most of the editor is skinned.
- Replaced the built-in CK Editor icon images with CSS using FontAwesome icons!
- Fixed the background colour for input elements.
- Commented many more lines for ease-of-use and future editing.

v1.1.0 | 07/07/15 - First major update!
- Redid a couple of elements.
- Completed the 1-1 chat interface and general requests interface.
- Completed the forum interface.
- Added a fix to display the copyright line notice which was normally hidden on the standard 7COT CSS when the notification bar for new messages/general requests was visible.
- Changed the compassion heart colour for standard and hover to better match the theme.

v1.0.0 | 07/07/15 - Initial release!
